root.ContentNotInstalledTitle: No content was found on your computer.
root.ContentNotInstalledDownloadContentText: To download content to your computer, click the Manage tab.
root.ContentNotInstalledText: No content is installed on your computer. Please see your Administrator for local Help content installation.
root.TopicNotFoundTitle: Cannot find requested topic on your computer
root.TopicNotFoundViewOnlineText: The topic you requested was not found on your computer, but you can view the topic online.
root.TopicNotFoundDownloadContentText: See the navigation pane for links to similar topics, or click the Manage tab to download content to your computer.
root.TopicNotFoundText: The topic you requested was not found on your computer.
root.TopicCorruptedTitle: Unable to display the requested topic
root.TopicCorruptedViewOnlineText: Help Viewer is unable to display the requested topic. There may be an error in the topic's content or an underlying system dependency.
root.HomePageIntroduction: Welcome to the Microsoft Help Viewer, an essential source of information for everyone who uses Microsoft tools, products, technologies, and services. The Help Viewer gives you access to how-to and reference information, sample code, technical articles, and more. To find the content you need, browse the table of contents, use full-text search, or navigate through content using the keyword index.
root.HomePageContentInstallText:
Use the Manage Content tab to do the following:

  • Add content to your computer.
  • Check for updates to your local content.
  • Remove content from your computer.
root.HomePageNoBooksInstalled: No content was found on your computer.
root.HomePageHelpSettingsText:
The Help Viewer displays content that you have installed on your computer.
To change your source of Help content, on the Visual Studio menu bar, choose Help, Set Help Preference.
root.HomePageGettingInstalledBooksError: Unable to get installed books. The content on your computer may be being updated. Please refresh this page to try it later.
root.SelectABookForTheTopicText: The topic is not available on your computer, but it is available in one or more books. Select a book to download.
root.NoBooksForTheTopicText: The topic is not available on your computer or in a book that you can download.
